A

App - Class in org.example.lab.agh
The App class serves as the main entry point for the Hotel Manager application.
App() - Constructor for class org.example.lab.agh.App
Constructs the App object, initializes the hotel by reading its configuration from an Excel file, and loads any previously saved guest data.

C

CheckinCommand - Class in org.example.lab.agh.command_package
The CheckinCommand class implements the Command interface and handles the check-in process for a hotel room.
CheckinCommand(Hotel, Scanner) - Constructor for class org.example.lab.agh.command_package.CheckinCommand
Constructs a new CheckinCommand with the specified hotel and scanner.

Constructs a new CheckoutCommand with the specified hotel and scanner.

E

execute() - Method in class org.example.lab.agh.command_package.CheckinCommand
Executes the check-in command, guiding the user through the room selection and guest registration process.
execute() - Method in class org.example.lab.agh.command_package.CheckoutCommand
Executes the checkout command, guiding the user through the process of selecting a room and calculating the final price for the stay.

Executes the command's specific logic.
execute() - Method in class org.example.lab.agh.command_package.ExitCommand
Executes the exit command by displaying a farewell message to the user.
execute() - Method in class org.example.lab.agh.command_package.ListCommand

execute() - Method in class org.example.lab.agh.command_package.PricesCommand

execute() - Method in class org.example.lab.agh.command_package.SaveCommand

execute() - Method in class org.example.lab.agh.command_package.UnknownCommand

execute() - Method in class org.example.lab.agh.command_package.ViewCommand
